titleStmt.title: The education or bringinge vp of children, translated oute of Plutarche by syr Thomas Eliot knyght
De educatione puerorum. English
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.
Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, in the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the Cundite, at the sygne of Lucrece,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De educatione puerorum.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the house of Thomas Berthelet, nere to the Cundite, at the sygne of Lucrece
